original_title: Goddess: The Fall and Rise of Showgirls
overview: A look at the production and enduring popularity of a modern trash classic from those bad boys behind 1992's Basic Instinct, the infamous screenwriter Joe Eszterhas and the envelope pushing director Paul Verhoeven. In 1995, their next film collaboration, Showgirls, was unleashed upon the world.
title: Goddess: The Fall and Rise of Showgirls
